title: (x) "Stars and Stripes" slab serif - Oxtail {Dav}
content:
Can anybody identify this font, much appreciated as usual

 [‹ (x) Galp Energia - FF Dax {Miguel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906114753/http:/typophile.com/node/18938 "Go to previous forum topic") [Solomon serif face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906114753/http:/typophile.com/node/17948 "Go to next forum topic")
author: scarlettx

comments.content: Please ignore ... it seems I can’t upload my image, most likely because I don’t have Flash player 8 installed. Haven’t been here in a while and still working on OS 9.2 so can’t get Flash 8 so I guess can’t upload my image.

You could still upload your image at / to a [free image hosting](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906114753/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&q=free+image+hosting&btnG=Search) site, _like [imageshack.us](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906114753/http:/imageshack.us/)_, and just link to the hosted file. _( Its easy, just one or two clicks and the site will supply you with a link. )_

_( Or send it to me, at formlos(at)gmail.com, and Ill upload it. )_

Dav

You can attach your image to your original post.

1. Click **edit** in the black bar at the top.
2. At the bottom of the page you’ll see **Attachments** in red.
3. Click **Browse** and select the image on your hard drive.
4. Click **Submit**.

Oxtail! I sometimes have to force myself _not_ to use that one. :^D

BTW When setting the italics at large sizes, do a negative tracking of -50/1000em to unlock the Secret Script Power. ;^)

Thanks David and Yves!

I think this picture is from Vougue Interior (Austarlian edition)... they have strted to use it all over the magazine. It sure gives some character to the articles. ;-)

Yeah and the “hidden” script-trick is for those who look deep.
